faqs.question: How do I redeem a gift card?
faqs.answer: Enter the gift card code during checkout to apply the balance.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can combine multiple gift cards while placing an order.

faqs.question: Do gift cards expire?
faqs.answer: Check the card terms; most gift cards have an expiration date printed on them.

faqs.question: What if my gift card code doesn’t work?
faqs.answer: Verify the code and contact support if it still doesn’t apply.
